title: Block Shares Rebound on Growth Outlook
sub_head: Fintech company sees gross profit rising sequentially in each quarter this year
body:
A rosier-than-expected outlook for growth for financial-tech services like Square and Cash App spurred a record rally in the stock price of their parent company, Block Inc.
Block’s shares rose as much as 26% Friday morning after executives allayed investors’ worst fears that its businesses wouldn’t be able to prosper in the absence of stimulus checks, fees from the government’s small-business loan program and other pandemic-induced benefits.
